data.message: So make my experience better by helping get back to my own name Dolly Griffin!  Seems like no one is interested in assisting me with this issue.  I've even sent my cell phone number to no avail.  Does anyone really read these posts?  I'm just curious.  😓

replies.message: Hi Dolly. We hear your frustration. To help make sure everyone uses their authentic name, you can only change your name every 60 days. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2uagsF1. We're working to improve the process for confirming or updating a name on Facebook as fast as we can. Thank you for your patience! -Ashley
Thank you, I understand the 60 day thing, but some of my friends have blocked me because they think I've been hacked.  just frustrated I guess!
I know some people block me because I was hacked. I try to apologize but they don't care. Even some of the public  groups. I am not begging for friends.
